disconnected.title: Connect Doppler with your miTienda store
disconnected.subtitle: Integrate all information from your miTienda Customers into your Doppler Lists automatically. Just follow the steps below.
disconnected.store_placeholder: Put the URL of your miTienda store
disconnected.connection_error: Oops! We could not connect with your miTienda store please try again later.

connected.title: Your miTienda store is already connected with Doppler
connected.subtitle: From now on you can syncronize your products with Doppler Templates, and send promotional Campaigns to your Contacts.
connected.list_title: Select the List to synchronize with miTienda
connected.list_subtitle: Choose the Subscriber List you wish to send all your miTienda customers.
connected.select_list_warning: If the chosen List already has associated Contacts, they will be removed. Only Contacts that have come from the integration will be saved.

delete_mode_grid.message: The synchronization will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?

disconnect_popup.title: Are you sure you want to disconnect this integration?
disconnect_popup.description: By confirming this disconnection, your List will no longer receive new Subscribers from your miTienda account. Anyhow, you won't lose the contacts synced up to this moment.

mapping.title: Map fields
mapping.subtitle: Take benefit of the data from your contacts in other apps to expand your Doppler list. If you canâ€™t find the same field among the options you can personalize it or omit it.
mapping.empty_email_error_message: Ouch! There must be at least one Email field selected.

status.title: Your miTienda store is already connected to Doppler
status.subtitle: Your Contacts were integrated automatically from your store by the Doppler extension for miTienda. You can also import your products into Email Templates and create Abandoned Cart and Product Retargeting Automations. Any doubts? Press
